FrierenMod:OrdinaryOffensiveMagic.NAME: Ordinary Offensive Magic
FrierenMod:OrdinaryOffensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 2 times the number of Mana Exhausted this combat.

FrierenMod:DefensiveMagic.NAME: Defensive Magic
FrierenMod:DefensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Gain !B! Block. NL Add another *Defensive Magic into your hand.
FrierenMod:DefensiveMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Gain !B! Block. NL Add another *Defensive Magic+ into your hand.

FrierenMod:RapidChant.NAME: Rapid Chant
FrierenMod:RapidChant.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Shuffle one *Mana into your draw pile.
FrierenMod:RapidChant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Shuffle one *Mana into your draw pile.

FrierenMod:ManaConcealment.NAME: ManaConcealment
FrierenMod:ManaConcealment.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Shuffle ALL *Mana in your hand and draw pile into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor1.NAME: Beta Factor 1
FrierenMod:BetaFactor1.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, your next Attack deals !SM! additional damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, your next Attack deals X additional damage.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor2.NAME: Beta Factor 2
FrierenMod:BetaFactor2.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Metallicize.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X Metallicize.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor3.NAME: Beta Factor 3
FrierenMod:BetaFactor3.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! [E] next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X+2 *Mana in pile, gain X [E] next turn.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor4.NAME: Beta Factor 4
FrierenMod:BetaFactor4.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, deal !SM! damage to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, deal 4X damage to all enemies .

FrierenMod:BetaFactor5.NAME: Beta Factor 5
FrierenMod:BetaFactor5.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 3X *Mana in pile, gain X Dexterity.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor6.NAME: Beta Factor 6
FrierenMod:BetaFactor6.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, deal Double Damage for the next !SM! turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 4X *Mana in pile, deal Double Damage for the next X turn.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor7.NAME: Beta Factor 7
FrierenMod:BetaFactor7.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, apply !SM! Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2X *Mana in pile, apply X Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor8.NAME: Beta Factor 8
FrierenMod:BetaFactor8.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, apply !SM! Vulnerable to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 3X *Mana in pile, apply X Vulnerable to all enemies.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor9.NAME: Beta Factor 9
FrierenMod:BetaFactor9.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, Draw !SM! card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X+1 *Mana in pile, Draw X card.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor10.NAME: Beta Factor 10
FrierenMod:BetaFactor10.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, add random !SM! frierenmod:Legendary_Spell into {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= draw pile|1= hand|2= discard pile}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, add X random frierenmod:Legendary_Spell into pile.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor11.NAME: Beta Factor 11
FrierenMod:BetaFactor11.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Intangible.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 6X *Mana in pile, gain X Intangible.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor12.NAME: Beta Factor 12
FrierenMod:BetaFactor12.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Block and Block is not removed at the start of your next !SM! turns.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2X *Mana in pile, gain X Block and Block is not removed at the start of your next X turns.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor13.NAME: Beta Factor 13
FrierenMod:BetaFactor13.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, add !SM! *Mana {@@} into {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Hand|1= Discard Pile|2= Draw Pile}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, add X *Mana into the next pile.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor14.NAME: Beta Factor 14
FrierenMod:BetaFactor14.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Mantra.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2X *Mana in pile, gain X Mantra.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor15.NAME: Beta Factor 15
FrierenMod:BetaFactor15.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X+2 Block.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor16.NAME: Beta Factor 16
FrierenMod:BetaFactor16.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! [E] .

FrierenMod:BetaFactor17.NAME: Beta Factor 17
FrierenMod:BetaFactor17.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X Strength.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor18.NAME: Beta Factor 18
FrierenMod:BetaFactor18.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, Cards containing \"Strike\" deal !SM! additional damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, cards containing "Strike" deal X+1 additional damage.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor19.NAME: Beta Factor 19
FrierenMod:BetaFactor19.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, All enemies lose !SM! Strength this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, all enemies lose X+2 Strength this turn.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor20.NAME: Beta Factor 20
FrierenMod:BetaFactor20.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, draw !SM! cards next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, draw X cards next turn.

FrierenMod:BetaFactor21.NAME: Beta Factor 21
FrierenMod:BetaFactor21.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, apply !SM! Poison to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, apply !SM! Poison to ALL enemies.

FrierenMod:Factor100.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, {@@} {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= ? |1= @|2= @}

FrierenMod:Factor010.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, {@@} {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= @ |1= ?|2= @}

FrierenMod:Factor001.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, {@@} {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= @ |1= @|2= ?}

FrierenMod:BetaProp1.NAME: Beta Prop 1
FrierenMod:BetaProp1.DESCRIPTION: Choose one [#ff2c1d]Unloaded[#ff2c1d] and one [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor ,swap their frierenmod:slot.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose one [#ff2c1d]Unloaded[#ff2c1d] and one [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor ,swap their frierenmod:slot.

FrierenMod:BetaProp2.NAME: Beta Prop 2
FrierenMod:BetaProp2.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random *Magic_Factor to your Magic Deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random *Magic_Factor to your Magic Deck.

FrierenMod:BetaProp4.NAME: Beta Prop 4
FrierenMod:BetaProp4.DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 [#ff2c1d]Unloaded[#ff2c1d] *Magic_Factor , swap their frierenmod:Slot with [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor 's randomly.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 [#ff2c1d]Unloaded[#ff2c1d] *Magic_Factor , swap their frierenmod:Slot with [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor 's randomly.

FrierenMod:BetaProp5.NAME: Beta Prop 5
FrierenMod:BetaProp5.DESCRIPTION: Only available in combat: Remove 2 [#ff2c1d]Unloaded[#ff2c1d] *Magic_Factor or *Magic_Prop, gain [E] [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Only available in combat: Remove 2 [#ff2c1d]Unloaded[#ff2c1d] *Magic_Factor or *Magic_Prop, gain [E] [E].

FrierenMod:BetaProp6.NAME: Beta Prop 6
FrierenMod:BetaProp6.DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 *Magic_Factor , add random *Magic_Factor with the same rarity in their frierenmod:Slot.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 *Magic_Factor , add random *Magic_Factor with the same rarity in their frierenmod:Slot.

FrierenMod:SwampSpell.NAME: Spell to Pull Out From a Swamp

FrierenMod:MoldSpell.NAME: Spell to Get Rid of Mold

FrierenMod:Perpetual.NAME: Perpetual
FrierenMod:Perpetual.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, shuffle 2 *Mana in your discard pile.
FrierenMod:Perpetual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of the turn, shuffle 2 *Mana in your discard pile.

FrierenMod:Disperse.NAME: Disperse
FrierenMod:Disperse.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Mana in your draw pile. NL Add 2 *Mana in your hand. NL Shuffle 3 *Mana in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:Disperse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Mana in your draw pile. NL Add 2 *Mana in your hand. NL Shuffle 3 *Mana in your discard pile.

FrierenMod:Flow.NAME: Flow
FrierenMod:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put one *Mana from your draw pile and discard pile in your hand.

FrierenMod:FolkGrimoire.NAME: Folk Grimoire
FrierenMod:FolkGrimoire.DESCRIPTION: Add a random frierenmod:Chant card and a random frierenmod:Legendary_Spell into your hand. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:FolkGrimoire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random frierenmod:Chant card and a random frierenmod:Legendary_Spell into your hand, they cost 2 less [E] . NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:Outpouring.NAME: Outpouring
FrierenMod:Outpouring.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you frierenmod:Synchro a *Mana this turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:Outpouring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Whenever you frierenmod:Synchro a *Mana this turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:ContinualChant.NAME: Continual Chant
FrierenMod:ContinualChant.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Shuffle !M! *Mana into your draw pile. NL frierenmod:Chant !CX!.

FrierenMod:PajamasForm.NAME: Pajamas Form
FrierenMod:PajamasForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust ALL *Mana and deal damage equal to 4 times the amount you Exhaust to ALL enemies. NL (Deal !M! damage)

FrierenMod:PreparedPosture.NAME: Prepared Posture
FrierenMod:PreparedPosture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a frierenmod:Chant card.

FrierenMod:Trick.NAME: Trick
FrierenMod:Trick.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add *ManaConcealment into your hand.

FrierenMod:FlowerFieldSpell.NAME: Spell to Produce Flower Fields
FrierenMod:FlowerFieldSpell.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. NL Add a *BlueMoonWeed into your hand.
FrierenMod:FlowerFieldSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. NL Add a *BlueMoonWeed+ into your hand.

FrierenMod:ClearMind.NAME: Clear Mind
FrierenMod:ClearMind.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Mana into your hand. This turn, frierenmod:Synchro changes into frierenmod:Accel_Synchro.

FrierenMod:AccessoriesSpell.NAME: Spell for Finding Lost Accessories
FrierenMod:AccessoriesSpell.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL At the end of combat, obtain a random relic.

FrierenMod:OilSpell.NAME: Spell to Remove Tough Oil Stains
FrierenMod:OilSpell.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If no one get killed by this, deal !D! damage once more.

FrierenMod:ApexMagic.NAME: The Apex of Magic
FrierenMod:ApexMagic.DESCRIPTION: If your hand, draw pile and discard pile each have just 4 *Mana, set all enemies HP to 0, otherwise draw !M! card.
FrierenMod:ApexMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If your hand, draw pile, and discard pile each have just 4 *Mana, set all enemies HP to 0, otherwise draw !M! cards.

FrierenMod:PancakeSpell.NAME: Spell to Flip Pancakes Perfectly
FrierenMod:PancakeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Exchange a *Mana in your hand with !M! card in your draw pile.

FrierenMod:TongueTwisterSpell.NAME: Spell to Say Tongue Twisters Successfully
FrierenMod:TongueTwisterSpell.DESCRIPTION: Traw !M! card. NL If you don't have *Mana in your hand, traw an extra one.

FrierenMod:MultipleOffensiveMagic.NAME: Multiple Offensive Magic
FrierenMod:MultipleOffensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal X+4 damage to a random enemy X times, add X *Mana into your hand.
FrierenMod:MultipleOffensiveMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X+4 damage to a random enemy X+1 times, add X *Mana into your hand.

FrierenMod:RitesPreparation.NAME: Preparation of Rites
FrierenMod:RitesPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Every 3 *Mana you frierenmod:Synchro, deal 8 damage to All enemies.
FrierenMod:RitesPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Every 3 *Mana you frierenmod:Synchro, deal 8 damage to All enemies.

FrierenMod:FireSpell.NAME: Spell That Starts a Fire
FrierenMod:FireSpell.DESCRIPTION: Add a *LittleSpark into your hand for every enemy in the room. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:FireSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *LittleSpark+ into your hand for every enemy in the room. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:Laziness.NAME: Laziness
FrierenMod:Laziness.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Play a *Mana to Exhaust this card. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a copy of this card into your discard pile.

FrierenMod:Recall.NAME: Recall
FrierenMod:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from Exhaust pile into your hand and Retain it. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:RustCleanMagic.NAME: Anti-Corrosion Spell
FrierenMod:RustCleanMagic.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Remove one of a non-boss enemy's buff and one of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:RedAppleSpell.NAME: Spell to Turn Red Apple into Green Apple
FrierenMod:RedAppleSpell.DESCRIPTION: Switch the amount of your Strength and Dexterity, add an *Apple into hand. NL At the end of your turn, switch back.

FrierenMod:LightningMagic.NAME: Destructive Lightning Magic
FrierenMod:LightningMagic.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Draw *Mana from draw pile and discard pile until your hand is full. frierenmod:Synchro change into frierenmod:Limit_Over_Synchro in the rest of the combat.

FrierenMod:BlueMoonWeed.NAME: BlueMoonWeed
FrierenMod:BlueMoonWeed.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:GrapeSpell.NAME: Spell to Make Sweet Grapes Sour
FrierenMod:GrapeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards in your hand and Exhaust them, then add 2 *Mana in your hand. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:BabySleeping.NAME: Sleeping Like a Baby
FrierenMod:BabySleeping.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, Retain 1 card in your hand. If your *Mana amount is a multiple of 3, Retain your hand.

FrierenMod:SerieGrimoire.NAME: Serie's Grimoire
FrierenMod:SerieGrimoire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Craft a frierenmod:Legendary_Spell! You will have more options. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:LittleFire.NAME: Little Spark
FrierenMod:LittleFire.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Backfire. Deal !D! damage and increase damage of ALL *LittleSpark by !M! this combat. NL Whenever you frierenmod:Synchro, return this back to hand from discard pile.

FrierenMod:FullAhead.NAME: Full Ahead
FrierenMod:FullAhead.DESCRIPTION: After frierenmod:Chant first time every turn, if your draw pile and discard pile has same *Mana amount, gain 2 Dexterity, otherwise, gain 2 Strength.

FrierenMod:LockTarget.NAME: Lock Target
FrierenMod:LockTarget.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw a card. NL If draw pile's *Mana amount equals or more than discard pile's, attack once more.

FrierenMod:FiveMinutesMore.NAME: Five Minutes More
FrierenMod:FiveMinutesMore.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . Add a *Laziness into your hand. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:FiveMinutesMore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . Add a *Laziness into your hand.

FrierenMod:CostZeroOption.NAME: The Pentacles
FrierenMod:CostZeroOption.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of !M! random card in your hand to 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: reduce the cost of 1/2 card(s) in your hand to 0 this turn.

FrierenMod:GainRandomCardOption.NAME: The Wheel of Fortune
FrierenMod:GainRandomCardOption.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random common card into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add 1/2 random common card(s) into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

FrierenMod:ExtinguishOption.NAME: Judgement
FrierenMod:ExtinguishOption.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set its HP to 0.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has 30/40 or less HP, set its HP to 0.

FrierenMod:UpgradeOption.NAME: The Tower
FrierenMod:UpgradeOption.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of the combat.

FrierenMod:UpgradeAllOption.NAME: The World
FrierenMod:UpgradeAllOption.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards for the rest of the combat. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:RemoveDebuffOption.NAME: The Wands
FrierenMod:RemoveDebuffOption.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL the debuff applied on you.

FrierenMod:PreciseChant.NAME: Precise Chant
FrierenMod:PreciseChant.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant ALL *Mana in the corresponding pile as possible. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:PreciseChant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant ALL *Mana in the corresponding pile as possible.

FrierenMod:ManaExpansion.NAME: Mana Expansion
FrierenMod:ManaExpansion.DESCRIPTION: Choose:Draw pile,hand or discard pile, DOUBLE the *Mana. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:ManaExpansion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: DOUBLE the *Mana WHEREVER are they (except exhaust pile). NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:ManaDetection.NAME: Mana Detection
FrierenMod:ManaDetection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever it is attacked, shuffle !M! *Mana into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:TimeConcept.NAME: Time Concept of Elf
FrierenMod:TimeConcept.DESCRIPTION: Send your everything 2 turns into the future.
FrierenMod:TimeConcept.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Send your everything 2 turns into the future, and frierenmod:world-line will change.

FrierenMod:Imagination.NAME: Magic & Imagination
FrierenMod:Imagination.DESCRIPTION: This turn, Your cards don't Cost [E] , Cost the same amount of *Mana instead. You CANNOT get new *Mana from cards, frierenmod:Chant can be FREELY activated. NL  Exhaust.
FrierenMod:Imagination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. This turn, Your cards don't Cost [E] , Cost the same amount of *Mana instead. You CANNOT get new *Mana from cards, frierenmod:Chant can be FREELY activated. NL  Exhaust.

FrierenMod:ContinuousShooting.NAME: Continuous Shooting
FrierenMod:ContinuousShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times to ALL enemies. Exhaust this when your draw pile has 3 or more *Mana.

FrierenMod:PerfectDefensiveMagic.NAME: Perfect Defensive Magic
FrierenMod:PerfectDefensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. NL Gain 1 frierenmod:buffer, then gain !B! Block.
FrierenMod:PerfectDefensiveMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. NL Gain 1 frierenmod:buffer, then gain !B! Block.

FrierenMod:MageStyleFinisher.NAME: Mage Style Finisher
FrierenMod:MageStyleFinisher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each *Mana played this turn.

FrierenMod:ManaParcel.NAME: Mana Parcel
FrierenMod:ManaParcel.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, add !M! *Mana to your hand and Exhaust.

FrierenMod:FinalChant.NAME: Final Chant
FrierenMod:FinalChant.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant ALL *Mana as possible, WHEREVER are they.

FrierenMod:Kiss.NAME: Kiss(very lethal!)
FrierenMod:Kiss.DESCRIPTION: Apply 99 Vulnerable and 99 Weak. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

FrierenMod:RestraintMagic.NAME: Restraint Magic
FrierenMod:RestraintMagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply frierenmod:Slow and the target loses 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:SeeThroughPhantom.NAME: See Through Phantom
FrierenMod:SeeThroughPhantom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, If the enemy intends to attack, Apply !M! Weak, otherwise, apply !M! Vulnerable.

FrierenMod:TrueColours.NAME: True Colours
FrierenMod:TrueColours.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX! . NL Gain [E] [E] [E] ,draw 3 cards, shuffle 3 *Mana into your draw pile, hand, and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:OpenTheWaygate.NAME: Open The Waygate
FrierenMod:OpenTheWaygate.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Analyze 1: frierenmod:Synchro !M! *Mana. NL *Reward: Take an extra turn after this one. NL (Progress: !SM! /7).
FrierenMod:OpenTheWaygate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Analyze 1: frierenmod:Synchro !M! *Mana. NL *Reward: Take an extra turn after this one. NL (Progress: !SM! /6).

FrierenMod:GrandCross.NAME: Grand Cross
FrierenMod:GrandCross.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you have activated a frierenmod:Chant effect this turn,

FrierenMod:HalfTheSky.NAME: Envy
FrierenMod:HalfTheSky.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you frierenmod:Chant, return this from your discard pile to your hand.

FrierenMod:Recycle.NAME: Recycle
FrierenMod:Recycle.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! *Mana in your discard pile, shuffle a *Mana into your draw pile.

FrierenMod:AirSlash.NAME: Air Slash
FrierenMod:AirSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This turn, frierenmod:Synchro changes into frierenmod:Accel_Synchro. NL You CANNOT get new *Mana from cards.

FrierenMod:Apprehend.NAME: Apprehend
FrierenMod:Apprehend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard *Mana you drawn.

FrierenMod:Free.NAME: Free
FrierenMod:Free.DESCRIPTION: Discard your *non-Mana card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

FrierenMod:MageStyleChoke.NAME: Mage Style Choke
FrierenMod:MageStyleChoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you frierenmod:Synchro a *Mana this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

FrierenMod:RingletForm.NAME: Ringlet Form
FrierenMod:RingletForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a *Mana, gain !M! Block.

FrierenMod:Repent.NAME: Too Late to Repent
FrierenMod:Repent.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose !M! cards in your discard pile and return them to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:HellFireSummoning.NAME: Hellfire Summoning
FrierenMod:HellFireSummoning.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Seal. frierenmod:Backfire. NL Deal !D! damage for each frierenmod:Chant played this turn twice.

FrierenMod:RockGolemSpell.NAME: Spell to Manipulate A Rock Golem
FrierenMod:RockGolemSpell.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Analyze 10: frierenmod:Synchro 2 *Mana NL *Reward: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and switch to Defend Mode. NL (Progress:0/2).

FrierenMod:LureTheEnemyInDeep.NAME: Lure The Enemy In Deep
FrierenMod:LureTheEnemyInDeep.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. NL Draw !M! card. If you frierenmod:Chant from hand, Upgrade this for the rest of the combat and return it to your hand.

FrierenMod:ManaCollapse.NAME: Mana Collapse
FrierenMod:ManaCollapse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have played less than 10 cards this turn, Add !M! *Mana into your hand and Put this card back to draw pile.

FrierenMod:Elegance.NAME: Elegance
FrierenMod:Elegance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Gain !B! Block, draw !M! card. NL If Fatal, increase its damage and Block by 2, and if you Fatal a Elite or Boss, increase draw amount by 1. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:Elegance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Gain !B! Block, draw !M! card. NL If Fatal, increase its damage and Block by 2, and if you Fatal a Elite or Boss, increase draw amount by 1.

FrierenMod:Confrontation.NAME: Confrontation
FrierenMod:Confrontation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you frierenmod:Chant when this card is in your hand, increase its Block by 3 this combat.

FrierenMod:Famehameha.NAME: Famehameha Wave
FrierenMod:Famehameha.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each time you frierenmod:Chant this turn. NL Deal !D! damage. NL [#A4EBFA]KA-ME-HA-ME-HA![]

FrierenMod:ManaBarricade.NAME: Mana Barricade
FrierenMod:ManaBarricade.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX! . NL If you *Chant from draw pile, gain !B! Block.

FrierenMod:ElementsBombing.NAME: Elemental Bombing
FrierenMod:ElementsBombing.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand, add a random *Elemental card to your hand for each card you Exhausted. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:ElementsBombing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand, add a random upgraded *Elemental card to your hand for each card you Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:Fire.NAME: Fire Elemental
FrierenMod:Fire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage twice. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

FrierenMod:Ice.NAME: Ice Elemental
FrierenMod:Ice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

FrierenMod:Light.NAME: Light Elemental

FrierenMod:Thunder.NAME: Thunder Elemental
FrierenMod:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

FrierenMod:Dark.NAME: Dark Elemental
FrierenMod:Dark.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

FrierenMod:SayThinkingSpell.NAME: Spell to Say What You're Thinking
FrierenMod:SayThinkingSpell.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all *Mana in your hand, play !M! random card in your draw pile for each *Mana you Exhausted.

FrierenMod:FrierenSuitcase.NAME: Frieren's Suitcase
FrierenMod:FrierenSuitcase.DESCRIPTION: Increase your hand size to 13 this combat. NL If your hand is full after you play a card, gain !M! Block.

FrierenMod:FairyTaleEnd.NAME: The end of Fairy Tale
FrierenMod:FairyTaleEnd.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Deal !D! damage. Double base damage of this card after you played a new kind of *Legendary_Spell this combat.

FrierenMod:UpsideDown.NAME: Upside Down
FrierenMod:UpsideDown.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL After you frierenmod:Synchro 1 *Mana, Switch your draw pile and discard pile and lose 2 hp.

FrierenMod:EmergencyFood.NAME: Emergency Food
FrierenMod:EmergencyFood.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
